results.title: Coronary artery thrombosis and thrombolysis in baboons: the effect of atenolol treatment on myocardial infarct size.
results.text_hl: In 12 @SPECIES_9557 @@@baboons@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Anomalous_Left_Coronary_Artery</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000080038 @@@thrombosis of the left anterior descending coronary artery@@@ (LAD) was induced and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (0.1 to 0.2 mg.kg-1 intravenously, sufficient to lower the heart rate by 20%) was administered 10 min after the onset of @DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischaemia@@@ in six animals, whereas the others received placebo.

citations.NLM: Herijgers P, Flameng W. Coronary artery thrombosis and thrombolysis in baboons: the effect of atenolol treatment on myocardial infarct size. Eur Heart J. 1991 Oct;12(10):1084-8. PMID: 1782934
citations.BibTeX: @article{1782934, title={Coronary artery thrombosis and thrombolysis in baboons: the effect of atenolol treatment on myocardial infarct size.}, author={Herijgers P and Flameng W}, journal={Eur Heart J}, volume={12}, number={10}, pages={1084-8}}
